title: Little Known yet Useful Google Apps
tags: Little Known yet Useful Google Apps
description: Do you know Google is also one of the most active app developers?  Nevermind, here are some of the lesser-known but useful Google apps that youre missing out on.  Google Opinion Reward -  Just a line -  Voice Access (Unreleased) -  Files go -  Toontastic 3D -  YouTube Kids -    You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use?   What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mic do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  What computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
